title: Manage an Employee Suspension
description: An employee is being placed on a 3-day paid suspension pending the outcome of an investigation.

tasks.description: Inform the employee of the suspension and its terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP and manager deliver the news to the employee.

tasks.description: Update the employee's status in the HRIS to 'Suspended' for the specified date range.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP correctly updates the employee's status.

tasks.description: Coordinate with IT to temporarily disable the employee's system access during the suspension.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP creates a ticket for IT to temporarily suspend access.
